name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: Happy Friday! It’s never a bad time to remember that to uphold free speech, one must engage with the paradox of tolerance. Embrace being relentlessly intolerant of intolerance.
content.value:
Happy Friday!

It’s never a bad time to remember that to uphold free speech, one must engage with the paradox of tolerance.

Embrace being relentlessly intolerant of intolerance.

photo.alt: Elle, a platinum blonde queer person, peeks out from behind their hair while drinking from a black coffee mug with a picture of a guillotine on a stage. There are words framing the picture of the guillotine that say “GIVE NAZIS A PLATFORM,” implying that Nazis should be beheaded.
